com.redhat.rhn.manager.channel
Class EusReleaseComparator

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.channel.EusReleaseComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<EssentialChannelDto>
public class EusReleaseComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<EssentialChannelDto>

EusReleaseComparator Compare two RHEL releases, where the behavior can differ depending on which version of RHEL we're dealing with. (RHEL 4 in particular needs special attention.) "Release" in this context ends up appearing more like what we'd call a version, i.e. 5.3.0.3. Thus a simple string comparison will not suffice. (5.10 > 5.9) Additionally, for all versions of RHEL, we may need to trim pieces of the version off to do the comparison. Sample releases: RHEL 4: 7.6, 8, 9 RHEL 5: 5.1.0.1, 5.2.0.2, 5.3.0.3
